reviewText: This is Rogers most comprehensive video to date I will watch it every year just to refresh my memory but it doesnt completely replace all his other videos as time constraints probably wouldnt allow the minute detail of single subject videos but almost. Cant go wrong buying for yourself or as a gift for Any whitetail hunter
Entertaining and informative, I enjoyed it and will watch every year at camp.

I love Roger Raglin! This single man has taught me more about hunting the magnificient whitetail deer, than anyone else, in my nearly twenty years afield. Do yourself a favor and buy this two volume set. You will never regret it!
This guy cracks me up but is also very knowledgeable
My husband asked for it for Christmas, and he loves it!

Absolutety one of Roger's best videos. This is a very long and informative DVD.
Roger breaks down topics such as:
* The importance of water
* Locating a place to hunt
* Scouting
* Stand approach and placement
* Hunting from the ground
* Calling and rattling
* The use of scents
* Deer drives
* Sitting all day
and much much more.
Although there are many 'plugs' for products Roger sells, this video is definately worth the watch.
Over 5 hours of Roger Raglin hunting techniques and tips for less than $20 is a steal.
Plus you get to see Roger's famous trophy room as he narrorates the video.
Overall, very pleased with the purchase, and definately a video we watch once a year, every year, before the hunting season.
